attributes.action: re-introduce school nurses to monitor headlice in schools;
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many children are unduly suffering due to the increase in headlice and whether parents are struggling to banish them or lack of time, money, enthusiasm or another reason children are often infested horrifically from the time they start school to the day they leave. 
The re-introduction of the 'nit nurse' will aide those children that do not have the access to medical assistance at home.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
